The worst mistake my country made when it finally transitioned into democracy, a full decade ago, was to keep most of the government bureacratic aparatus in place, as well as leaving intact the most corrupted parts of the previous regime's establishment, such as worker's unions. This eventually made it so that we now face the prospect of having the very same people ruling the country regardless of who wins an election... Susan Boyle shot to fame after auditioning for Simon Cowell 's Britain's Got Talent TV show, and she told the music mogul she dreamed of becoming as successful as her idol Elaine Paige . Elaine Paige subsequently labelled Susan Boyle a virus that swept the world , but made up for the slur by performing her track from the Chess musical I Know Him So Well with the unlikely superstar on a UK TV special. the election, he apparently vetoed one of Michael Gove 's proposed special advisers, Dominic Cummings . There was tension with Steve Hilton , too. "They're just chalk and cheese," says one senior Cameroon. Andy Coulson was the measured professional, cautious, a bit more Right-wing. Anti-bullshit, anti-hipster. And Steve Hilton was the opposite. According to one Cabinet minister, the two "complemented" one another, with Steve Hilton providing big, blue-sky ideas about the Tory party and the 21st-century state, while Andy Coulson handled the practical realities of day-to-day
